channel.title: R on Badran Elshenawy
channel.description: Recent content in R on Badran Elshenawy

item.title: Tidyverse Series – Post 8: Handling Dates & Times with lubridate
item.description: Master date and time manipulation in R with lubridate. Learn how to efficiently parse, extract, and compute time-based calculations in the Tidyverse.

item.title: Tidyverse Series – Post 7: Importing & Handling Data Efficiently with readr
item.description: Master data import in R with readr. Learn to load, clean, and process large datasets efficiently using modern Tidyverse tools.

item.title: Tidyverse Series – Post 6: Handling Categorical Data with forcats
item.description: Master categorical data manipulation in R with forcats. Learn to reorder, lump, recode, and handle missing factor levels efficiently with real-world examples.

item.title: Tidyverse Series – Post 5: Data Joins & Merging with dplyr
item.description: Master dataset merging with dplyr joins in R. Learn about inner, left, right, full, semi, and anti joins, with practical examples and handling missing data.

item.title: Tidyverse Series – Post 4: The Power of Tidy Data
item.description: Discover how tidy data simplifies data wrangling, visualization, and analysis in R with the Tidyverse. Learn how to reshape and clean data efficiently.

item.title: Tidyverse Series – Post 3: Reshaping & Cleaning Data with tidyr
item.description: Discover how tidyr makes data reshaping and cleaning in R simple, readable, and efficient with functions like pivot_longer, pivot_wider, separate, unite, and more.

item.title: Tidyverse Series – Post 2: Mastering Data Manipulation with dplyr
item.description: Discover how dplyr makes data manipulation in R simple, readable, and efficient with five key verbs: select, filter, mutate, arrange, and summarize.

item.title: Tidyverse Series – Post 1: Why the Tidyverse is a Game-Changer for R
item.description: Discover why the Tidyverse is a game-changer for data science in R, simplifying data wrangling, visualization, and reproducibility.
